function: Confront and integrate shadow material at the foundational level of soul
work: Work with laws 1-10 to establish basic alignment and face the unconscious patterns that distort harmony and free will

function: Hold space for emotional and spiritual processing at the spirit level
work: Work with laws 11-20 to develop compassion and discernment and navigate the terrain of forgiveness and sacred anger

function: Facilitate death-rebirth cycles and transmit sacred knowledge
work: Work with laws 21-30 to channel divine purpose and wisdom and steward the flow of revelation and sacred teaching

function: Monitor long-range patterns and guard against civilizational drift
work: Work with laws 31-40 to hold cosmic responsibility and perceive the threads of interdependence across time and space

function: Seed the future and hold the vision of what humanity is becoming
work: Work with laws 41-50 to embody absolute truth and cosmic love and carry the light eternal into the next age
